entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AND FREEZING RAIN LATE THIS EVENING, THEN SLEET, FREEZING RAIN WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW AND SLEET ACCUMULATION
NEW ICE ACCUMULATION OF UP TO A TENTH OF AN INCH
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

SLEET AND FREEZING RAIN
PRECIPITATION MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES
SLEET ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
ICE ACCUMULATION OF ONE QUARTER TO ONE HALF OF AN INCH
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY
FREEZING RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES
ICE ACCUMULATION OF UP TO A TENTH OF AN INCH
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEW LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS ZERO TO 5 ABOVE ZERO
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
